description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Schnitzel Rolls With Tahini Parsley Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Schnitzel Rolls With Tahini Parsley Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken between 2 sheets of plastic wrap. Using a meat mallet, pound until 5mm thick. Place flour on a plate. Whisk eggs and 2 tbs water in a shallow bowl. Combine breadcrumbs, seeds and paprika in a shallow dish.
Dip chicken in flour, egg and lastly breadcrumb mixture. Place on a tray. Continue with remaining chicken.
Heat half the oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Repeat with remaining oil and chicken.
Meanwhile, place garlic, parsley, tahini, yoghurt, 4 tbs of juice and 1/2 cup water in a food processor. Process until smooth and combined. Season with salt and pepper.
Combine salad leaves and remaining juice in a bowl. Place roll bases on board. Top with lettuce mixture, then schnitzel (cutting to fit) and drizzle with tahini sauce. Sandwich with roll tops. Serve.
